name: Apple and Cinnamon Oatmeal
instructions: Cook oats and milk until soft, then add chopped apple and cinnamon.
image_prompt: A close-up of a ceramic bowl with oatmeal, topped with diced red apples and cinnamon powder, soft morning light, 8k.

name: Egg White and Spinach Omelet
instructions: Sauté spinach and mushrooms, then add egg whites and cook until set.
image_prompt: Fluffy white egg omelet with spinach and mushrooms on a white plate, bright kitchen lighting.

name: Avocado and Egg Toast
instructions: Spread mashed avocado on toast and top with a boiled or poached egg.
image_prompt: Toast topped with mashed avocado and a poached egg with runny yolk, sprinkled with red pepper flakes.

name: Chia Seed Pudding
instructions: Mix ingredients and refrigerate overnight to thicken.
image_prompt: Glass jar of chia pudding layered with fresh strawberries on a marble counter.

name: Banana Protein Pancakes
instructions: Blend ingredients until smooth and fry in a non-stick pan.
image_prompt: Stack of golden brown pancakes with banana slices and maple syrup drizzle, white background.

name: Greek Yogurt and Granola
instructions: Pour yogurt into a bowl and garnish with granola and fruit.

name: Peanut Butter Toast
instructions: Spread butter on toast and arrange banana slices on top.

name: Mediterranean Frittata

name: Green Detox Smoothie

name: Cottage Cheese Bowl

name: Shakshuka (Tomato Omelet)

name: Quinoa Porridge

name: Egg White and Turkey Wrap

name: Egg Sandwich
